title: Anyway for Victorious Morgana?
body: I love playing Morgana a ton and i've gotten pretty much all her skins besides Victorious. I began in season 6 and i got gold 5, i unlocked Victorious Maokai and had just found out that those skins exist. I've desired for the Morgana skin for a LOOOOONG time now, but I keep seeing that It's not available anymore, is there like any form or special way i can still get it?

replies.body:
:( not right now.

Maybe, if someone popular asks.
Riot should give "Victorious Tokens" for each queue. Then you can purchase any Victorious Skin/Chroma. Imo that would be a good way. Graves has Chromas now, so it opens the door to chromas for the old skins if they wanted.
sadly thats a horrible idea no offence..  it would devalue the people who actually worked hard in the past seasons to get that reward from gold + and i like the way they have victorious chormas..

I think that is a little harsh on those who had no way to even consider getting gold in ranked. Im not saying give access to the victorious skin first season after, im just saying 5 - 6 seasons after shouldnt be an issue.

sadly no they will not bring back victorious skins.. due to those being season ranked rewards exclusive to people to climing past gold for that season  .. say they brought back a victorious skin how would the people be compensated for getting the rank at that season.. i wouldnt want some crappy chorma or loading screen border

Hey Iâ€™m just here offering an idea. What if they were to open a store type thing that you could buy old victorious skins but only for people gold and up? Or do you still like exlisivity of being from a specific season?

well the thing is how would you reward the people who earned it in that season?  you cant do borders because borders are not valued enough as a reward, you cant do chromas because we already have those for each ranked que you hit gold in,   the best bet would be a prestige skin.. thats like an evolved version of the victorious skin that only people who previously earned the skin in that season gets.. but then we loop back around.. people will start wanting that prestige victorious skin,     i personally dont like hte idea of there being a shop for it.   look at the prestige points that riots starting to do
nope. that was for season 4 only

Unfortunately, no. All skins from Ranked rewards are exclusive to that season in which they were released.

Season 1: Jarvan
Season 2: Janna
Season 3: Elise
Season 4: Morgana
Season 5: Sivir
Season 6: Maokai
Season 7: Graves

Once the season has ended, there is no way to obtain said skin.
What would be cool is after each season those rewarded by getting gold+ could choose from previous victorious skins. As opposed to being handed the current

I got it and it's amazing. It doesnt help you out but I just wanted to say how awesome the skin is. GL on the rift.
